about_the_game:
This is a SUPPORTER Package that will get YOUR NAME on a Grave (Tombstone) inside the World Graveyard.

Simply put the name you want added and we will add your name (must be within TOS)!

We are continuing to add skills, characters, enemies, dungeons, quests, items and more to the game without any cost for DLC's. THIS WILL ALL BE FREE! Hence, if you would like to support our adventure in that or even go above and beyond with the support, consider grabbing this "Grand Strokers - Name on Tomb Stone" Pack.

THANK YOU for all your support, my friends!

Eternally Yours,

-Necro-
-NECROCATICGAMES-

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains swear words that someone could find offensive. Big bad swear words...

The game is punny and contains a ton of jokes about masturbation and sex too!

All characters, enemies and bosses are over the legal age and have consent to be in the game and participate in LAWFUL sexual positions and situations.
